FileFormat.FormatDescription: Animatic Film is an Atari animation format associated with the Animatic Animation System software by Kinetic Microsystems.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: The National Archives and Records Administration / The National Archives and Records Administration
FileFormat.ProvenanceDescription: 11/2023 (v.115)- Max-offset modified for BOF signature to allow for more exact signature identification. Internally researched.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF:Offset of 48 followed by ' followed by 0x18 (Cancel) followed by ( followed by 0x18 (Cancel)
